text: kad kanet lekum usvetun hasenetun fi ibrahime vellezine me`ah. iz kalu likavmihim inna buraau minkum vemimma ta`budune min duni-llah. keferna bikum vebeda beynena vebeynekumu-l`adavetu vebagdau ebeden hatta tu'minu billahi vahdehu illa kavle ibrahime liebihi leestagfiranne leke vema emliku leke mine-llahi min sey'. rabbena `aleyke tevekkelna veileyke enebna veileyke-lmesir
